## Quaternion.fromEulerAngle() method

Creates a quaternion from an euler angle in specific order.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static fromEulerAngle(a: number, b: number, c: number, order?: EulerAngleOrder, result?: Quaternion): Quaternion;
```
